text: cpu utilization does not update on the server-status page. This has been tried on RHEL 5.4, CentOS 5.5, and CentOS 5.4 with both RPM based installations from the RHEL / CentOS repositories, as well as compiling from source with httpd-2.2.10.tar.gz, and httpd-2.2.15.tar.gz
creator: tim.galyean@rackspace.com
tim.galyean@rackspace.com
text:
Just re-created this on Ubuntu 10.04 with apache 2.2.3 from source:

wget http://archive.apache.org/dist/httpd/httpd-2.2.3.tar.gz
tar -xzf httpd-2.2.3.tar.gz
cd httpd-2.2.3
./configure --enable-module=most --enable-mods-shared=most --enable-module=so
make
make install

server status page shows:
CPU Usage: u0 s0 cu0 cs0
